main event: On 27 May 1949, an observer flying an SNJ aircraft spotted 5 to 8 unidentified flying objects in a formation over Southern Oregon.
interesting points: The objects were described as elongated oval, possibly egg-shaped and appeared solid with a metallic color,The sighting occurred at around 1425 hours PST,The observer estimated the speed of the objects to be between 190 to 260 MPH,The objects maintained a steady flight path with no change in altitude and flew in file formation,The weather conditions were clear, with exceptional visibility allowing the observer to see up to 75 miles.
sighted object: five to eight elongated oval objects
witness description: A private pilot with over 5,000 flight hours, described as conservative, sincere, and reliable.
